data.--autolock: Enable manager autolocking (requiring an unlock key to start a stopped manager)
data.--data-path-addr string: Address or interface to use for data path traffic (format: <ip|interface>)
data.--external-ca external-ca: Specifications of one or more certificate signing endpoints
data.--force-new-cluster: Force create a new cluster from current state
data.--max-snapshots uint: Number of additional Raft snapshots to retain
data.--snapshot-interval uint: Number of log entries between Raft snapshots (default 10000)
